sentence.Network_en: Earth's atmosphere has nothing that resembles a big, stable, anticyclonic flow.
sentence.Network_cn: 地球的大气层没有哪一部分象是一股稳定的大反气旋流.

sentence.Network_en: Deep mixing south of Cape Palliser indicated the presence of an anticyclonic eddy.
sentence.Network_cn: 帕利瑟(CapePalliser)南部的深层混合说明,该地区有一股反气旋涡旋.

PerfectNetExp.abs: 反气旋(anticyclone) 大气压高于周边空气的一个区域。中心点气压最高,气压随着远离中心而降低。空气从反气旋流出的速度正比于气压梯度。 反气旋的(anticyclonic) 一.
anticyclone 移动气旋, anticyclonic 反气旋式, anticyclones 反气旋的

list.abs: 根据反气旋形成和活动的主要地理区域，可将反气旋分为极地反气旋（polar anticyclone）、温带反气旋（extratropical anticyclone）和副热带反气旋（subtropic.
anticyclolysis 反气旋消散anticyclonic vorticity 反气旋涡度antinode 波腹
anticyclonic 反气旋的anticyclonic inversion 反气旋逆温antiderivative 不定积分
subterranean water level 地下水位subtropical anticyclone 亚热带高压subtropical climate 亚热带气候

means.word_mean: 1. of or relating to or characteristic of the atmosphere around a high pressure center

auth_sentence.content: It is also a result of the frequent and persistent anticyclonic weather which prevails in this region.
auth_sentence.res_content: It is also a result of the frequent and persistent anticyclonic weather which prevails in this region.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: It is also a result of the frequent and persistent anticyclonic weather which prevails in this region.
